Reviews.Title: “Okay, but heavily outdated”
Reviews.Author: noodles114
Reviews.Content: this place is located in the middle of branson. its a little ways off the strip so there is not much traffic on the road in front. it has a nice swimming pool with a large hot tub. But the rooms are outdated. it looks like something that would have existed during 1989. It has a box tv. Too short of a shower. But a quite large bathroom. It is pretty much aplace to stay for one or 2 nights, but not a week.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: lynne1008
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a vacation for thanksgiving was the worse vacation I ever had. The rooms was very filthy and the service was the most horribliest I have ever seen. The people at the desk were very unconcerned about ours need. They seemed more interested in talkin on the phone about personal things. The housekeepers seem to be on something and always had a alocholic drink on cart. As for my room its was very dirty and outdated and in major need of some repairs. The maintence man seem to not even care that our tv did not work. And about there breakfast it was so bad i wouldnt even feed it to my outside dogs. Warmed over gravy and reused biscuits oatmeal so thick i could use it for wallpaper paste. When I asked to speak with owner I was told was not there to watch a guy gentleman go to the apt with a fine dinner for two. I would hate to think I knew what such bad service I had that I had to hide my face. I will never go there nor recommend anyone to stay there. They need shut down in a bad way.

Reviews.Title: “THIS PLACE SUCKS”
Reviews.Author: Sandy S
Reviews.Content: We were on a bus tour and stayed here from 11/14/11 to 11/17/11. When we arrived the room was sweltering hot and the refrigeratior was not on. There were 3 of us and had 2 towels (not towels that you could wrap around you). The management brought over 10 more towels. The next day when the maid came in she took all our towels and bath mat and didn't replace them. Plus my camera charger and extra was missing. For breakfast we had to walk across the driveway. They had oatmeal and grits in crockpots. An open jar of peanut butter and an open jar of jelly (no packets of either). The dry cereal was stale and the waffles were toaster waffles. All the bread was frozen and the biscuits were not done in the middle. When we asked for more towels they brought them and set them on the hall floor outside our door where everyone walks. The next day they sat them outside our door in a plastic bag. None of the people (44 of us) had maid service after that first day. There was another tour bus from another tour company and some of those people had bugs in their rooms. It was so bad that a representative from our tour company had to come. Our last day there they did have jelly packets but no peanut butter packets. Had we been on our own we would have checked out and gone to another place. Plus it is off the beaten path. You can not walk anywhere. I wouldn't recommend this place to my worse enemy. It is the pits. Oh, if you want to use their free internet you won't be able to get on because their signal is so weak.

Reviews.Title: “always negoatiate within reason!”
Reviews.Author: curus005
Reviews.Content: 9/2/11 Mountain Music Inn is the big sister to Leisure County Inn and has more services including breakfast prepared by the owner. Also a buiding with indoor rooms wih jacuzzies and a indoor swimming pool with an exercise room which is one of the two buildings across from another outdoor pool. Guest laundry, conference room with fire place, etc. My experience is as a guest of those who stay. There are group rates, off season rates, and discounts for extra nights. Enjoy Babs!

Reviews.Title: “Will never stay in this dump again!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jasonw82
Reviews.Content: All we can say is that is the worst experience that we have ever had in this hotel. The housekeeping service was absolutely the worst. They had not changed the sheets but did make the beds, didn't know what a sweeper was as we had to go to the front desk 3 times to get them to clean our floors, they forgot how to wipe down any mirrors or tubs (talk about loads of soap scum). The ice maker outside of our room was out of service and they used a walmart cooler that they filled and sat on the floor in front of the ice maker. Like we was going to use that. As for the pool area, the indoor pool was so cold you couldn't stand to be in it for more than 5 or 10 minutes at a time, the hot tub didn't work, no jets no bubbles nothing, and last time i checked exposed electrical wiring inside a pool area is a fire hazard due to all the moisture in the room that is coming in contact with the wires. Save your money and pass this hotel on by!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not a comfortable stay at all!”
Reviews.Author: unhappy111
Reviews.Content: First of all the room only had three towel settings, although our reservation was for four. When we called the front desk, we were told that if we wanted extra towels w had to come and get them. ( The front desk was in the other buliding outside of the sleeping area. The rooms werenot clean, and the entrance into the hotel has a urine odor. The continental breakfast consisted of stale donuts and milk from the jug. Although the apple and orange juice was very cold and tastey. We will NEVER stay there again, before you make a reservation, take a guick peek.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderfull Time”
Reviews.Author: retiredstlouis
Reviews.Content: My wife and i have been staying at this hotel for about 20 years.We started staying there because its off the main roads but still has easy access tn all the entertainment. We also liked the original owners and staff.We would come to Branson about four times a year.Over the years we had some good times at mountain music. It was always like coming home everyone was so friendly.The hotel has changed hands over the years and went through some hard times. But we have allways had a good time and a wonderfull experience every time we have stayed at mounain music. In the last two years my wife and i have had some health problems and did not go to Branson.So when we were able to travel again i got on line to book a room and after seeing some of the comments i hesitated to book a room. My wife and i decided to take a chance and we were glad we did. The new owners were most gracious and did everything to please us. They are remodeling and sprucing up the place. The rooms were clean and i was asked if we needed a hair dryer,micrwave, or iceboox. I said I could us an icebox , and they brought one to our room in ten minutes.All in All our stay was five out of five starson everthing. We left good friends and hope to return again in the fall. My wife and i would recomend this hotel 100 %

Reviews.Title: “Super Christmas getaway”
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at the Mountain Music Inn. The staff was helpful. The rooms were comfortable and we enjoyed the swimming pool. We will definitely go see the Christmas lights in Branson and stay at the Mountain Music Inn. A SUPER value.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here we had a check stolen”
Reviews.Author: MickeyJo45
Reviews.Content: I and my sisters family stayed over a weekend. My sister lost a paycheck and thought she had accidently thrown it away. Between the two familys we had 3 lap tops and some expensive camera equipment, I am thankful we didnt have our rooms cleaned and just got fresh towels so no one had an excuse to be in our rooms. It took an hour for someone to unlock the door at the pool so my grandson could swim (it was 4:30) in the afternoon at night only one row of the lights in the pool area worked. OH and after my sister got home and had her boss cut her another check she found out it had been cashed at The MUSIC MOUNTAIN INN. Her named had been forged. After calling she was told it was used to pay for her room NOT we both paid with credit cards. The person told her HE would take care of it and he talked to her boss he also said he didnt want a problem with this, I would think not WHO would cash a third party check with out an ID unless they worked there. The free breakfast was crock pot oatmeal and dry cereal and stale bread you could toast your self they did have coffee when it was made and a bottle of orange juice you could pour yourself

Reviews.Title: “VERY Relaxed stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: BDH8
Reviews.Content: I just don't understand why there are so many negative comments about this hotel/motel.... During my stay i experienced great and friendly service. ALL employees were VERY helpful and went above and beyond their duties to accomadate my needs. My fiance and I took full advantage of the workout room and many other ammenities. Not to mention an amazing view of Branson's '76 Hwy. Located in a quiet atmosphere but walking distance to the Strip, I will definately stay here on my next visit!!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our Stay”
Reviews.Author: SherryACox
Reviews.Content: We just celebrated our anniversary and I was more than a little afraid to visit this hotel after reading the reviews. However, our suite was very nice. The bed must have been a California King and it was very comfortable. The room was large, clean, and had no bad odors. The jacuzzi was clean, bathroom was clean and loved the idea of the extra vanity area outside the bathroom. We also had our own little refrigerator and there was a couch that folded out into a bed. The only complaint was the air. It was cold but, the room was so large it wasn't keeping up. We brought our fan along and by morning we were super cold. We would stay again and probably get the suite. Our daughter could sleep on the pull out couch.

Reviews.Title: “Norman Bates!!!”
Reviews.Author: JimmyD65
Reviews.Content: Holy Cow!! This place was terrible and very sketchy from the get go. We didn't like how far away it was from everything. There was NO ONE there when we pulled in. The guy at the desk was a REAL CREEP and had zero customer service skills. After he gave us 1 key, we had to go all the way over to a completely different looking building-very rickety as my husband said. When we pulled in, a complete stranger came over to us and asked if we had stayed there yet. We said no and he told us to check out that there was no air and the inside was nasty. We checked out the room- stinky and just creepy. When we decided to check out 30 minutes later, the guy at the desk ( with a stained shirt) gave me an attitude. So glad I left! DO NOT GO, I would rather camp on the ground!

Reviews.Title: “Just ok”
Reviews.Author: Treyfus
Reviews.Content: After reading the negative reports was worried...but prepared. We also have stayed there for many years. Definately not as good as the old owners. New owners 3 yr ago. Male clerk at desk wasn't the sharpest...was told we had connecting rooms in the motel part but upon arrival there was no such thing. Heard several other guests complaining about being told that and it wasn't true. The breakfast isn't what it used to be but sufficient...considering many places you get nothing. They said it ends at 9:30am and it does. They will not extend a few minutes. Just not the friendly staff that made Branson, Branson. If you do not put the sign out for maid service, you get none...which was alright with us...but no one told us that.... The hotel is still located in a great spot and parking is pretty level everywhere...that is what we like.

Reviews.Title: “It is sad a troll will make troubles - Mountain Music Inn they never visited!”
Reviews.Author: Chuck304
Reviews.Content: I am in Mountain Music every month and would not stay anywhere else! It has a friendly well educated and trained staff. It is a quite Inn with two pools one indoor , and one out door. The Inn has it's charm and character of warmth and welcoming! If you read any of the bad reviews of the Inn I would say some one was not happy and made identities or have friends that will join them in the evil plight to cause some nice businesses harm! We are in an internet world of mean and deceitful people among us , you will find them driving on our roads, allowing the children run a muck, and going online to see how they may bring a business to their knees for laughs! Trolls is the term I believe, a person that the only task is to make and cause trouble to the innocence and the kind. From reading what some wrote I see the signature of this multiple identity troll! My carpets are fine being in several rooms I have not seen the carpets mentioned in the bad reviews. The flickering lights? Well I have always been sober and can not say that I have ever seen such an illusion. Off in the far distance you may see a ww1 search light hitting the clouds. But you really have to look for that. The continental breakfast? No complaints there , and about a lady jumping a child, that could be possible , parents do not educate respect of others property , yet I doubt any one jumped on a child here. And if they did the mentality of this parent probably would not have noticed the child being scolded anyway! IMO Children should be kept close by and monitored not allowing misbehavior . I was not there when it happened it is just my opinion. But the only time I seen a negative was maybe this filling that was on her cell phone too much and not watching the breakfast. But people will be people, it did not dicourage my visit! Noise? The main road is 2 blocks away, could this noise been your own? Noise is a made up companit as this Inn is a quite place to be. Over all some one that complains Of the Mountain Music Inn could not have been to the same one I frequent! 300 Schaefer in Branson is the Place I was, and it is nothing as the negitive reviews say! Even the guest are friendly and helpful to each other making it a very family oriented stay forme and my family! So stop by and visit , take light that bad people will make trouble in a town, ether for their own lonely entertainment or to make harm to ANOTHER business. Not saying another Inn hotel or motel is up to this but it has happened in other businesses. Greedy mean full people in this world as you know it are out there. This Inn is great! I ask my friends to be here not a problem! It is just a bad case of people miss using the net and forums like this!

Reviews.Title: “Gone Down Hill”
Reviews.Author: JingJing13
Reviews.Content: My grandparents and I have been staying at Mountain Music Inn for the past 8 or 9 years. We have always appreciated the value, cleanliness and service of this property. However when my grandmother and I returned this weekend, we were less than satisfied. When we arrived in the room we noticed numerous stains in the carpet and a very overdone scent of bad deodorizer. Upon turning my bed down, I found three dirty wadded up tissues between my sheets, obviously giving me doubts about the cleanliness of my bed linens. So I called the front desk (this was around 10:30pm on Friday), but after about 20 rings, I gave up and walked to the office. There I found the front desk worker on the phone with what seemed to be a personal phone call. He asked the person to "hang on", and when I explained my dilemma, he said he would see if he had any sheets in the back, but if not, he would just have to get them to me "when he could"! Well as luck would have it he did have some "older, thinner, but CLEAN sheets" (this is how HE described them) in the back that he handed over to me. (No apology, no offer to move us to a different room.) Needless to say, my grandmother and I both agreed we will NEVER be returning to Mountain Music Inn!

Reviews.Title: “Last minute booking”
Reviews.Author: KClady1957
Reviews.Content: Ok, I've stayed here before. This is my 3rd time back. The last time I stayed here we were in the outside "motel" unit...awful. We decided to give this property one more chance, and booked it again. At least this time, I was wise enough to book a "hotel" room. It was much nicer thant he motel. The room was as clean as it could be judging by the age of the property. I'm inclined to agree with the other reviews as to the helpfullness of the staff. They could be nicer. You get the feeling they are doing you a favor by assisting you. We didn't use the breakfast, remembering last time it was quite skimpy. That said, I'd still reccommend this spot if someone was looking for a very cheap out-of-the-way place to stay in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Give Me My Money Back”
Reviews.Author: hogfan05
Reviews.Content: This was the absolutely worst hotel I have ever stayed in. The staff was very unhelpful. Almost to the point of "so what"? The phone had the cord cut to it. The wireless internet did not work. The heater was out of the indoor pool. The baby crib they gave me was a ricked bucket of bolts. It alone was a lawsuit waiting to happen. No soap or hairdryer. There were hardley NOBODY staying there. First sign. DO NOT STAY HERE AT ALL COSTS. This hotel has went DOWN HILL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Wonderful!!!”
Reviews.Author: once2live
Reviews.Content: My family and I just got back from taking my Dad to Branson for his retirement & I chose this hotel for our stay. I had read some of the reviews on Trip Advisor & was looking for the comments that the others had left. When I got there, I was absolutely impressed with the hotel. It was very clean. You can't beat the value of this place! I've stayed other places in Branson, but I now have a new place to stay! The indoor heated pool & hot tub was very nice & clean! My Dad, being 68 years old, even got in both of them! They even had pool towels right there in the pool room for your convience. I have never seen that before, and it was very nice! I don't like to go get pool towels everytime my boys want to jump into the pool. The pool room floor was also very elegant. It was built out of native rock and was not real slick either! And having an 11 year old boy and an 8 year old boy, that was a blessing! The elevator was great being that my Dad can hardly climb stairs anymore. It also was very clean & smooth. I had also read reviews of the beds being uncomfortable. And I have back problems, so I was really looking for them to be uncomfortable like the other reviews had said. To my surprise, they were quite comfortable. The bathroom & shower was clean and the room service always made sure we had enough towels & washcloths. Both a/c and heater worked very well. With the weather trying to change at this time of year, you need a a/c during the day & heater by night. Both were great & thermostat controlled which was extremely nice! I read in another review about someone saying something about lights bouncing around the room at late hours of the night. That can be explained very easily! This was one of the first things I discovered! The lights were from one of the theaters close by. They have lights moving around like airports have and they were not bright, but "could" reflect if it's cloudy, but they were not as bright as what I had invisioned in my mind. The service I received from this hotel was absolutely wonderful. The continental breakfast was great as well. Everything, in my opinion, was on the "up & up"!!!!!!!! Thank you Mountain Music Inn for an absolutely wonderful stay! You all will be our new hotel of choice & we will definately recommend you to all we know that are coming for any type of stay in Branson Missouri. Thank you once again!

Reviews.Title: “Bad beds”
Reviews.Author: KClady1957
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 2 years ago. That time, we had an interior room, which was quite nice. I believe this hotel closed down for a time after that (not sure, but heard this from my sister-in-law). Anyway, the kids and I were looking for a place to stay for Oct 24th for 2 nights. I remembered this place had an indoor pool, so went straight to their website to book. (That said, when we checked in, we were advised the indoor pool was closed due to some issues with chemicals. We were given the option to not check in, but at 6:00PM on a Friday night, I didn't really want to drive around looking for a place to stay with an indoor pool, that wasn't expensive. We elected to go ahead and stay). I had decided to go ahead and save a few bucks and book the exterior (motel) room. I wish I had either looked for another place to stay, or chosen the interior rooms. The beds were terribly uncomfortable. (Even my 16 year old son had a sore back upon getting up both Sat and Sun morning). The carpets were stained terribly. They looked like a good carpet cleaning would take care of it. I do have to admit the bathroom was spotless, and the shower was strong and hot. The breakfast was not terrific. The coffee was weak, and selection to eat wasn't very big. We go to Branson about 3 or 4 times a year, and I'm constantly looking for a nice place to stay. I'm not sure I would come back here without their website advising of a refurbishment.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed Guest”
Reviews.Author: MyGiddy
Reviews.Content: Interior rooms with king beds were nearly impossible to find when we made our last-minute reservations in Branson. One of the clinchers for selecting Mountain Music Inn was the indication of wifi in the room on the hotel's website. Imagine my surprise when I was unable to log onto the web from my building and had to do so from the middle of the parking lot or breakfast room. Upon asking, the desk attendant gave us the opportunity to look at other rooms in the complex and though I could connect to the internet from the motel (exterior) rooms, the quality of the rooms was noticeably less. Maybe my magnifying glass was out because of the wifi incident, but a number of other issues showed themselves during our four-day stay. Towels were small and though plentiful, rough on the skin. A dark face cloth and reminder note was provided so guests would use that for removing make-up. The only tolietries provided were tiny bars of soap. The clock in the room was not working. There was not adeuate lighting in the room. In addition, small flourescent bulbs were utilized in the hallway (instead of flood bulbs) making it very dark as well. It looked to me like the easiest and cheapest method were used for any problem that arose. The contintinental breakfast was spartan at best and the coffee so weak the newspaper could be read through it. Housekeeping staff was friendly, breakfast staff was not. Desk staff was mixed. Would I stay here again or recommend the place? Sorry, but no way.

Reviews.Title: “Book a Room in Branson before you get there!”
Reviews.Author: schoolmarm
Reviews.Content: We decided at the last minute after a round of golf near Springfield to go to Branson. Took in a show right at 7:45 then tried to find a room around 10:00. Lots of places were already booked--we were tired and after finding no rooms anywhere we did a walk in at Mountain Music Inn. Room was old--can't believe there was no hair dryer. Chairs had dark grease spots on them as well as the carpet was not clean. Sheets were okay so we decided to stay. Ask for a better room and although we were shown another room it had been smoked in so we decided to keep our original room. Slept well--but would make sure we tried to find a better room next time. Front desk people were friendly--looks like this motel has been well used. With the economy maybe they can't afford to upgrade. Won't stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “We were very satisfied”
Reviews.Author: bfishdaily
Reviews.Content: We were very satisfied with our room at the Mountain Music Inn. We stayed only two nights. I researched it thoroughly. All we cared about at the time was a CLEAN room with a good value. Our rooms (we booked two) were definitely very clean and although not terribly up-to-date, they weren't worn-looking. I noticed some mixed reviews, so maybe we got some of the better rooms. No blow dryer, fridge, etc., but we were prepared for this. The breakfast was adequate, nothing special. The reason I gave this an above average review was because I thought you couldn't beat it for the money--we paid about $50/night. We got what they advertised.

Reviews.Title: “Haunted-No Lie!”
Reviews.Author: Travel300
Reviews.Content: My husband and I are very "down to earth" people, so this was truly a bewildering experience. Around midnight, my husband and I awoke to a light bouncing around the room. That was weird, but we just went back to sleep. At about 2 AM, I woke up feeling an enormous pressure on my chest and my hands were tingling. My husband woke up at that time too, and asked me how I felt. All I told him was that I felt strange ( I didn't want to freak him out). He said he felt weird too, so he turned on the lamp for a few minutes. We both went back to sleep. In the morning, he said he had something to tell me after we left the hotel. When we were in the car, he said he awoke at 2 AM with pressure on his whole body, he said his hands were tingling and it felt like someone was laying on top of him. At that point, I FREAKED out, and told him that's exactly what happened to me at that time. I still can't believe how weird that whole experience was. Other than that, the stay was ok-needs remodeling, but then again, you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend staying if you expect much”
Reviews.Author: Beach-lover-mom
Reviews.Content: If you plan to stay here keep your expectations low and it will be fine. The only good thing I could say was that you can get a room with two queen size beds and they have an indoor pool. We cut our trip to Branson short because the hotel was so bad. Beds are uncomfortable, no blow dryer, no soap or shampoo (other than mini hand soap bars), no coffee pot, very minimal breakfast. We also had to leave our air conditioner on high the entire time just to keep the room barely cool and the bathtub wouldn't drain properly. The hotel was really showing it's age and the owners don't seem to put any money back in to the property. $58 dollars a night was definitely too much...like my husband said, you get what you pay for. We will be sure to book the room well in advance so that we can stay at a better hotel next time as we will not ever be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “ok-but not great”
Reviews.Author: CAAdams
Reviews.Content: We stayed 6 nights and had some pros and cons: Pros: quiet- It was a quiet week for Branson so that helped. This is a large hotel, so it could be noisy when fully booked. Breakfast: While not as extensive as some continental breakfasts I've had, it was adequate. The person who does the breakfast keeps it very clean and well stocked. There is a large dining area, so plenty of seating. Cons: Room:Our air conditioner did not work very well and we had trouble keeping the room from getting stuffy. I suppose this could change from room to room. Fortunately, it was only in the 80's. Any hotter and we would have been miserable. Housekeeping was hit and miss. Sometimes they forgot to leave a bar of soap, other times it was glasses to drink from. I'm very good about tipping housekeeping staff, and that usually means I don't have any problems in this area. While not enough to ruin a vacation, it was a little frustrating when you wanted a drink of water after brushing your teeth and there wasn't a glass. Another thing that bothered me was the lack of information available for hotel guests about the hotel. We had to keep calling the front desk to find out what time breakfast was, Was there an exercise room (yes), and other questions that could easily be answered by posting a one page info sheet in the room. Overall, we were less than thrilled with the room. We booked it because of its high ranking on Trip Advisor (for the price). However, it has really slipped in the rankings during the last month. While the price seemed very inexpensive, there were many hotels in this price range in Branson. Overall, I did not think it was the best value for the money and I would look elsewhere if I every went back to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Not a pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: Wolfeaj
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a 1 night stay at that Mountain Music Inn. The perks to the room was that we were able to check in early in the day and it was a fairly quiet room with a ton of water pressure in the shower. Downsides were (yes, there are many): The carpet was worn and stained. The furniture was in very poor condition. The beds were lumpy and the pillows were very flat. The hotel staff was less than friendly at check in and check out; we had to request information about breakfast (that we skipped), the locataion of the pools, etc) Small bug problem in the bathroom, so we kept the door shut at all times to avoid them getting in the main room. We were placed in the older section of the hotel making it a long walk to the small, cold indoor pool with 2 young children. Like a previous poster indicated (I wish I had seen that post before we made our reservation) there were some strange comings and goings at night. On our walk back from the pool at about 9:30 or 10, we noticed several cars with people just sitting in the parking lot sporadically through the lot, 1 directly in front of our room (we had no neighbors on either side) for at least 30 minutes that we knew of. Something just didn't seem right about it. We stay in Branson frequently (approx. 4 times a year) and this is the first time we have felt less than safe. We will not be staying in this hotel again and defintely will not be recommending it. There are some very nice, reasonably priced accomodations in Branson that feel very safe, so defintely look around for a different place.

Reviews.Title: “Not the Best Branson Motel”
Reviews.Author: Giltedge
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights at this motel. I booked it based on reviews from this website and AAA. I was very disappointed with our stay. This was our first time in Branson and I will definitely stay somewhere else if we ever go back. The motel was difficult to find and was tucked away from all the activity. We were given a room in the older part of the facility. I don't know if this based on the price we paid or what. Our room was large but very old. The carpet was worn and dirty, the pillows were saggy, small TV. We thought all the rooms had refrigerators when we booked but for $3 more a night they brought one to our room. They provided no hair dryers, irons, shampoo or lotion. We had to ask for another roll of toilet paper when ours was running low. They also advertised free wireless internet but you had to leave your building and go to the breakfast room to be able to use the internet. The continental breakfast was pretty good. We had biscuits and gravy one morning and the other two mornings they had oatmeal along with all the other standard continental food items you would expect. Apparently they rent out rooms to young foreign workers as there were numerous young Russians who showed up for breakfast and then were picked up by a van each morning. There were some strange comings and goings on during the night - such as vehicles with young people sitting in the parking lots. I was not real comfortable with the situation. This apparently is a slow time for Branson and we found that most of the motels had many vacancies and were offering some very good deals. I thought I had booked one of the better motels based on what I read but I definitely think this place has seen its better days.

Reviews.Title: “Stay At Your Own Risk!!!!”
Reviews.Author: giftwood
Reviews.Content: The first thing we found wrong with the room, was a dead worm of some sort along with human hair on the bathroom floor behind the door. The shower was in terrible shape, with a used bar of soap from the previous guest still in the shower, and a build up of soap film on the shower wall, from what appeared to be weeks, if not months of build up from never being cleaned. The cove base was coming off of the wall in the bathroom, there was a notice asking guests to use the "Dark Washcloth" to remove makeup, yet there was no such cloth provided. The ceiling was peeling off above the jacuzzi, and jacuzzi was as dirty as the shower. The first time we filled it and turned it on, before we ever got into it, the bubbles being generated were coming out with a milky white film all over them. We ended up draining and refilling it several times before we used it, but it was still a very uncomfortable felling, using this obviously filthy jacuzzi. Not using it as planned, definitely made our stay an overpriced waste of time and money. The air conditioning was just as dirty as the rest of the room, making us get congested and feel ill whenever we were in the room. I took the liberty to lift the front off of the A/C unit and looked at the filter, and it was visibly filthy which has been proven to cause "Sick Building Syndrome." When all of the air in a room is moved through one A/C unit with one simple filter collecting all of the dust, bacteria, virus's in the air, if the filter is never changed or cleaned, it no longer is a filter, but a dispenser of illness. The last and most deplorable thing, was that in three nights of staying there, our sheets were never changed once, even though it was very hot and the sheets were soiled, then on the third night the temperature dropped significantly, but the maid had removed the blanket from our bed that day, so we only had a sheet and a bedspread, leaving us a little chilled. The "Icing On The Cake" was their Continental Breakfast. The coffee wasn't even hot, the donuts were dry, the "Crock Pot" Oatmeal looked like it had been slow cooking all night, and the hard boiled eggs were left open and exposed to the air, as was all of the food, for all of the flies to land on, and there were lots of flies. Mountain Music Inn is not worth the money and will definitely not be seeing my smiling face again.

Reviews.Title: “The BEST place to stay in all of Branson!”
Reviews.Author: millertyme
Reviews.Content: WOW! My wife and I just got back from a 4 day stay in Branson. We searched online for a place to stay. We've stayed in a couple different hotels before this trip. The reviews of the MMI were all so good that we decided to give it a try. I will tell you that everything that has been said about how wonderful this hotel is is our exact findings! The rooms are clean, nice and the bed is very comfortable. The staff is simply wonderful. Upon arrival our TV in our room was turning itself on and off by itself. We called the front desk and the clerk laughed and said, "Oh, did I forget to tell you that room is haunted?" She not only gave us another room, but also upgraded us to a bigger room and had someone come help us move all of our luggage for us. THIS IS SERVICE! The indoor pool and hot tub is wonderful. The view is great. You can see the strip without having to hear all the noise. We are planning a return trip next summer with my in-laws, and will definitely be staying at this wonderful hotel again. To the staff of the MMI, THANK YOU! You rock!

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”
Reviews.Author: AliasAnn
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the mountain music inn for our 18th wedding anniversary. We arrived early in the day, way before check in. We asked if we could check in early and the front desk person said that wasn't a problem at all, not even thoe we were 3 hours early. The room was very clean. The only problem we had was whenever another guest turned on the water in another room near ours we could hear it. The two person jacuzzi next to the bed was roomy enough and very comfortable! We didnt' eat the free breakfast and decided to eat in Springfield on our way home

Reviews.Title: “Great room- great value!”
Reviews.Author: lka70
Reviews.Content: Definately a great place to stay! Room was very nice - clean, well stocked and comfortable. My daughter had a lot of fun in the indoor pool. The extra sink outside the bathroom was very handy. Very family friendly hotel. We would definately consider a return stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: claytrentsmom
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Mountain Music Inn for our honeymoon. It was a wonderful experience! The rooms are perfect size and VERY clean! The continental breakfast is to be expected for free. The desk clerk and managers were great! The pool was perfect temp and very clean. They provided pool towels which was very convienent! The hotel is a secluded, QUIET area but so close to everything in Branson. If you are looking for a central location but very quiet, this is the perfect place. The employees are so helpful. I want to thank tripadvisor for letting me review this hotel before staying because that was one reason we stayed there in the first place. The price is perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Great low cost place to stay! We loved it!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at Mountain Music Inn and had a wonderful experience. If you are looking for a low cost hotel, then this is the one to stay at. They have 2 pools......one inside which was really nice when raining and one outside. The pools were very clean and they provided towels for swimming. The rooms were nice and really clean also. They had a free breakfast each morning which consist of waffles, toast, cereal, muffins, oatmeal, juice and milk. Some days they would switch out the oatmeal for biscuits and gravy. We loved the breakfast and the staff at the hotel are very friendly and nice. The owner is at the hotel most of the day and is very nice and helpful also. We would definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “We always go back to Mountain Music Inn!”
Reviews.Author: IndependenceMan
Reviews.Content: We go to Banson, Missouri 2-3 times a year and the Mountain Music Inn is one of our favorite places to stay. It is off the strip however you have the benefits of using the alternate routes to avoid traffic and road noise. It is easy to get to the Music Shows, Silver Dollar City, Celebration City, multiple exhibits such as the Titanic and of course a Host of available restaurants nearby. We expecially love the Hotel section of Mountain Musin Inn because it has an elevator and inside corridors. The rooms are also a little bigger and there are two vanities, one inside the bathroom and the other outside which makes getting ready a breeze and is great for families or when going with another couple. The motel section is also nice however the rooms are a little smaller with outside corridors and only one vanity in each room. There are two swimming pools and one hot tub. The inside pool and hot tub are in the hotel section and my wife especially likes these when returning from Silver Dollar City or the Music Shows in the evening. The Pool and hot tub stay open usually between 11:00-11:30 depending on the number of guests using them. I might add that even if you are not staying in the Hotel section that the Motel part also availability to use the same facilities in the Hotel Section. The Continental Breakfast Bar is good and about par for the other places in Branson. It has a nice setting that features an open hearth fireplace and ice cream chairs and table. Kids stay free however since ours are grown we especially like their hospitality card that they punch each night you stay and after so many you are rewarded a free nights stay. This is our home away from home and hope you enjoy your stay as much as we do. A Happy Branson Travelor at Mountain Music Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: DSchmidtNekoosa_Wi
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Mountain Music Inn for 3 days in November 2005. Booked online through the hotel's website and got a good rate and they also booked 3 shows for us at a discounted rate. Found out later when we arrived we probably good have done a little better on the price of the shows by taking advantage of the discounts offered in the shows brochures. Everything went smoothly when we arrived, the rooms where ready and they had vouchers for the shows that we booked through the website. The staff was friendly and helpful and the rooms were clean. They have three buildings, the hotel (which is the newest) with the pool, the office which also houses the dining room, and another motel with outside entrances. We stayed in the hotel which had the pool. The dining room was large and clean but I thought the breakfast left a lot to be desired, cold cereal, oatmeal, biscuits & gravy, and muffins. The facility sets about three blocks off the main highway so there wasn't any problems with noise. Overall a nice hotel and would probably stay there again based on the cleaniness of the rooms and friendly staff. There were two nice hotels next store that don't advertise on tripadvisor that had cheaper rates according to their marquee. They do have a website, one was the Queen Anne II and the other the Spinning Wheel Inn. I don't know if they offer a breakfast or book shows so in the long run the Mountain Music Inn might be the best choice.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay!”
Reviews.Author: obtech4u
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the hotel part last week. The room was spacious and very clean. the staff was extremely helpful and courteous. There is extra towels at the indoor pool so you don't use up all your bathtowels. Next time we go to Branson we will definatley stay here. I highly recommend Mountain Music Inn!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay!”
Reviews.Author: flatriver
Reviews.Content: Our family stayed in Oct. 2004 at the Mountain Music Inn while we were in Branson. We enjoyed our stay and have no complaints. The only improvement I thought they need to make was in the Breakfast buffet. They need some eggs, bacon, & sausage added to it!

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay at Mountain Music Inn”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel in June 2004. we had a good time. The pluses outweigh the minues. First the pluses-- Nice hotel,clean rooms, great pool and whirlpool (inside) great location behind Days Inn on yellow route. easy routes to SDC and Celebration City. Affordable rates, Coin Laundry room for guests. Now just two minuses-- 1. The continental breakfast is not very good.(I can overlook the breakfast part) 2. Daily maid service needs improvement. On first arrival the room is very clean. we stayed there 3 nights and we had to ask the front desk for fresh towels daily. not much housekeeping was done during our stay. Overall, I would stay there again. The good points easily outweigh the bad points.

Reviews.Title: “We love this place”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel twice and each time was wonderful. The indoor pool and hot tub are very clean and the area is very nice. We also loved the deluxe continental breakfast, our family of 5 got off to a good start with it. :) The owners are very friendly and happy to be there and the rooms are very clean and roomy! I highly recommend, my only complaint is that the prices have gone up lately.
